document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Gyllenhal, L. (1835) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyilenhal, C. H. Boheman, el entomologis aliis illustratae. Tomus tertius. - Pars prima. [1836], Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 505 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
354 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , ZMUM , NSPU , PIN , IMC , SKC ) from 20 provinces were studied.
Cherkasy Prov.
:
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Korsun-Shevchenkivskyi Distr. , bank of Dnieper River ,
on
Cirsium incanum , Ter–Minasian
leg.,
23.vi.1933
;
3 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kaniv Nature Reserve , Globova leg.,
6.vii.1946
;
idem,
27.viii.1946
;
Chernivtsi Prov. :
1 spec. (photo observation, UkrBIN ID 40549) Kytsman Distr , Shtpyntsi , N48.372000 , E25.731000 , observed by N. Smirnov ,
9.vii.2017
;
Crimea
: 2 spec. ( KUMN ) Koktebel ,
200 m a.s.l.
, A. Shekhovtsov leg.,
11.vii.2009
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Ay Petri Mt , Bartenev leg.,
15.vii.1985
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) Karadagh , M. Filatov leg.,
10.viii.1995
;
1 spec. ( SKC ) Feodosia Distr. , Krasnokamyanka, S. V . Konovalov leg.,
19.vi.2013
;
4 spec. ( SIZK ) Simferopol Distr. , Angarsky pass,
6.vii.1968
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Bakhchisaray Distr. , Sokolyne , Bolshoi Canyon , V . H. Dolin leg.,
27.vi.1972
;
5 spec. ( SIZK ) Armyansk , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
12.v.1983
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Dzhankoy Distr. , Tselinne, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
14.v.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Zemlyanichne, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
24.v.1983
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Dolinska Distr. , Nova Hryhoryevka ,
on
Cirsium setosum , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
17.vii.1983
;
6 spec. ( SIZK ) Novoukrayinka , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
16.vii.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Novgorodka , gully, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
15.vii.1983
;
24 spec. ( SIZK ) Dobrovelichkivka ,
on
Cirsium setosum , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
15.vii.1983
;
4 spec. ( SIZK ) Dolynska Distr. , Vesely Bokovenky, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
13.vii.1983
;
Lviv Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Sambir Distr. , Rudky ,
13.vi.1965
;

Mykolaiv Prov.
: 2 spec. ( SIZK ) Bratsk env.,
10.vii.1968
;
1 spec. ( ZIN )
Mykolayiv , E. Fisher`s coll.;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Pervomajsk Distr. , Kuripchino , Nesterov leg.,
25.v.1980
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Ochakiv Distr. , Porutino, S
.
V . Volovnik leg.,
24.v.1982
;

.
V . Volovnik leg.,
25.v.1982
;

,
V . K. Rafalskyj leg.,

;

: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol , forest park, on flowerheads of
Carduus , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
15.vii.1981
;
12 spec. ( SIZK ) Rozyvka Distr. , Kamyani Mohyly Reserve ,
on
Cirsium setosum , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
14.vi.1983
;
4 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol Distr. , Sosnovka , Staroberdyanskyi Forest , reared from flower heads of
Cirsium ukrainicum , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
2.ix.1982
;

Zhytomyr Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK )
Zhytomyr , G. Proschiga leg.,
4.vii.1929
.

Biology. Primary steppes, secondary grasslands and ruderal habitats. Adults occur in V–IX. Oligophagous on
Cirsium
,
Carduus
; adults feeds on others Asteraceae as well (
Batra et al. 1981
; Krivets 2007 ; Skuhrovec & Gosik 2011 ).
